phases.name: New Moon
phases.description: The moon is not visible from Earth's perspective. It marks the beginning of the lunar cycle.

phases.name: Waxing Crescent
phases.description: The moon is partially illuminated, growing larger each night.

phases.name: First Quarter
phases.description: The moon is one quarter of the way through its orbit.

phases.name: Waxing Gibbous
phases.description: The moon is mostly illuminated, growing larger each night.

phases.name: Full Moon
phases.description: The moon appears fully illuminated from Earth's perspective.

phases.name: Waning Gibbous
phases.description: The moon is mostly illuminated, shrinking in size each night.

phases.name: Last Quarter
phases.description: The moon is three quarters of the way through its orbit.

phases.name: Waning Crescent
phases.description: The moon is partially illuminated, shrinking in size each night.
